Package gamedata

Class Silhouette

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamedata.Silhouette
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IconProvider
    public class Silhouette
extends Object
implements IconProvider
    A stencil shape that can be used to "cut out" a marker or token. Silhouette shapes are defined using a greyscale image; white areas will be cut off while black areas will be included as part of the marker's shape. Shades of grey are correspondingly transparent and can be used to create soft edges via antialiasing.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String DEFAULT_PORTRAIT

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Silhouette​(String key, String stencilResource, BufferedImage stencil)
      This constructor is used when a saved file contains a stencil that is not installed in this copy of Strange Eons.
      Silhouette​(String key, String stencilResource, String portraitResource, double bleedMargin)
      Creates a new silhouette with unique key key, that will obtain a stencil image from stencilResource and use portraitResource as its default portrait.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Silhouette

        public Silhouette​(String key,
                  String stencilResource,
                  String portraitResource,
                  double bleedMargin)
        Creates a new silhouette with unique key key, that will obtain a stencil image from stencilResource and use portraitResource as its default portrait.
        Parameters:
        key - the unique key
        stencilResource - resource file of the stencil image
        portraitResource - resource file of the portrait image; may be null
        bleedMargin - the bleed margin surrounding the silhouette, in points, or 0

        public BufferedImage getStencil()
